## ERC20Wrappable type

Represents a certain amount of ERC20 tokens that can be wrapped

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ERC20Wrappable = {
    contractAddress: string;
    tokenAmount: Amount;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [Amount](./sdk.amount.md)
